analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
na kusalam no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam nogantham dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam noogham dhammam paṭicca pe

original: noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
analyzed: no yogam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusala

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
